@colo288 use VLC right click on the video on the menu panel click on video >>subtitles>>load file>>>locate fle
Thanks for the upload:)

colo288: another way is to make sure the movie and subtitles have the same file name, and are in the same folder; VLC will automatically acquire any .srt file with the same name as the video being played.
